cleaned_text: Reference Book: [Star Wars Saga Edition Force Unleashed Campaign Guide](/wiki/Star_Wars_Saga_Edition_Force_Unleashed_Campaign_Guide) You are highly trained in medical procedures for all conditions. Battlefield Medic[ ] Prerequisite: Steady Under Pressure You can use the [First Aid](/wiki/First_Aid) application of the [Treat Injury](/wiki/Treat_Injury) skill on a creature as a [Standard Action](/wiki/Standard_Action) instead of a [Full-Round Action](/wiki/Full-Round_Action). Bring Them Back[ ] You can use the [Revivify](/wiki/Revivify) application of the [Treat Injury](/wiki/Treat_Injury) skill on a target that has died anytime within a number of rounds equal to one-half your Heroic Level. Emergency Team[ ] You are skilled at working on and managing an emergency medical team. Allies automatically succeed on [Aid Another](/wiki/Aid_Another) attempts when assisting you with [Treat Injury](/wiki/Treat_Injury) checks. Extra First Aid[ ] You can use the [First Aid](/wiki/First_Aid) application of the [Treat Injury](/wiki/Treat_Injury) skill one additional time per day on a target that has already received [First Aid](/wiki/First_Aid) for the day. Medical Miracle[ ] As a [Standard Action](/wiki/Standard_Action), you can make a DC 20 [Treat Injury](/wiki/Treat_Injury) check on an adjacent target. If the check is successful, that target immediately uses its [Second Wind](/wiki/Second_Wind), even if it is above half Hit Points. If the target has already expended all of its [Second Winds](/wiki/Second_Wind) for the day, this Talent has no effect. Natural Healing[ ] Your extensive knowledge of [Natural Healing](/wiki/Natural_Healing) allows make [First Poison](/wiki/Treat_Poison) checks without a [Medical Kit](/wiki/Medical_Kit), if you have access to appropriate natural substitutes (as determined by the Gamemaster). Second Chance[ ] Prerequisite: Steady Under Pressure If you fail your [Treat Injury](/wiki/Treat_Injury) check, your patient does not take any additional damage, nor does it die, even if the failed check would normally require it. Steady Under Pressure[ ] You can choose to reroll any [Treat Injury](/wiki/Treat_Injury) check, keeping the better of the two results. When making a [Knowledge (Social Sciences)](/wiki/Knowledge_(Social_Sciences)) check to [Mentop](/wiki/Mentop) (see [Complications](/wiki/Complications)), you may reroll your check, keeping the better result.
